column4: just recently my computer with linux started to open games in a small area surrounded by black instead of taking the entire screen. what is causing this and how can it be fixed?
you need to be more specific what game? which technology it uses, did you upgraded those packages recently?
recently i added another monitor for dual monitors. i disabled the second monitor before playing the game though.
all games ive tried so far such as quake 4

ahh then that's the problem you X still thinks it has two monitors, you need to setup two different configurations one for having 1 monitor another for the second, the reason you didn't knew this is because ubuntu probably made your first config without you even noticing
